## 1)
Decide which of the models could be the source of each of the appropriate
columns in the dataset. Use the AIC criterion and read the document
posted in the course site.

### Getting the data
```{r}
df=read.csv(file="sample_data.csv",header=TRUE, sep=",")

head(df)

stock1=ts(df[1])
stock2=ts(df[2])
stock3=ts(df[3])
stock4=ts(df[4])
stock5=ts(df[5])

```

## Defining the function to fit the 5 models defined below

![Diff SDEs](Capture.png)
``


```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(Sim.DiffProc)
library(Ecdat)

pmle=eval(formals(fitsde.default)$pmle)
print("We'll use euler method for our Maximum Likelyhood")

Best.fit<-function(data,pmle)
{
  #model1
  fx1 <- expression( theta[1]*x )
  gx1 <- expression( theta[2]*x^theta[3] )
  mod1 <- fitsde(data=data,drift=fx1,diffusion=gx1,start = 
                   list(theta1=1, theta2=1,theta3=1),pmle=pmle)
  # competing model 2
  fx2 <- expression( theta[1]+theta[2]*x )
  gx2 <- expression( theta[3]*x^theta[4] )
  mod2 <- fitsde(data=data,drift=fx2,diffusion=gx2,start = 
                   list(theta1=1, theta2=1,theta3=1,theta4=1),pmle=pmle)
  # competing model 3
  fx3 <- expression( theta[1]+theta[2]*x )
  gx3 <- expression( theta[3]*sqrt(x) )
  mod3 <- fitsde(data=data,drift=fx3,diffusion=gx3,start = 
                   list(theta1=1, theta2=1,theta3=1),pmle=pmle)
  ## competing model 4
  fx4 <- expression( theta[1] )
  gx4 <- expression( theta[2]*x^theta[3] )
  mod4 <- fitsde(data=data,drift=fx4,diffusion=gx4,start = 
                   list(theta1=1, theta2=1,theta3=1),pmle=pmle)
  
  ## competing model 5
  fx5 <- expression( theta[1]*x )
  gx5 <- expression(theta[2] + (theta[3]*x^theta[4]) )
  mod5 <- fitsde(data=data,drift=fx5,diffusion=gx5,start = 
                   list(theta1=1, theta2=1,theta3=1, theta4=1),pmle=pmle)
  #  Computes AIC
  AIC <- c(AIC(mod1),AIC(mod2),AIC(mod3),AIC(mod4),AIC(mod5))
  Test <- data.frame(AIC,row.names = c("Model 1","Model 2","Model 3", "Model 4","Model 5"))
  Test
  Bestmod <- rownames(Test)[which.min(Test[,1])]
  Theta1 <- c(coef(mod1)[[1]],coef(mod2)[[1]],coef(mod3)[[1]],coef(mod4)[[1]],coef(mod5)[[1]])
  Theta2 <- c(coef(mod1)[[2]],coef(mod2)[[2]],coef(mod3)[[2]],coef(mod4)[[2]],coef(mod5)[[2]])
  Theta3 <- c(coef(mod1)[[3]],coef(mod2)[[3]],coef(mod3)[[3]],coef(mod4)[[3]],coef(mod5)[[3]])
  Theta4 <- c("",coef(mod2)[[4]],coef(mod5)[[4]],"","")
  Parms <- data.frame(Theta1,Theta2,Theta3,Theta4,
                      row.names = c("Model1","Model2","Model3","Model4","Model5"))
  
  list('best.mode'=Bestmod,'parms'=Parms,'AIC.results'=Test)
}


```
### For Stock 1

```{r, warning=FALSE}
fit1=Best.fit(data =stock1,pmle = pmle[1])
print(paste("Best model =",fit1$best.mode))
```
